body_html: One little note: make sure to have a favicon.ico in the root folder. Or a route that rewrites that to the real location. Otherwise your webserver will serve a 404 for some MS IE versions that have that check hardcoded (they don't look into the html for the correct location :( )
body_text: One little note: make sure to have a favicon.ico in the root folder. Or a route that rewrites that to the real location. Otherwise your webserver will serve a 404 for some MS IE versions that have that check hardcoded (they don't look into the html for the correct location :( )
body: One little note: make sure to have a favicon.ico in the root folder. Or a route that rewrites that to the real location. Otherwise your webserver will serve a 404 for some MS IE versions that have that check hardcoded (they don't look into the html for the correct location :( )
